alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:13PM EDT until July 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Grayson County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Hardin County in central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/. * At 513 PM EDT/413 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leitchfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Grayson and southwestern Hardin Counties, including the following locations... Spike, Spurrier, Rock Creek, Broad Ford, Peonia, West Clifty, Pearman, Snap, Grayson Springs and Clarkson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
